sys_ui_macro.name: SaveUser
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <input type="button" onclick="createUser();" value="Save User"/>
    <script>
    <![CDATA[
    function createUser() {
        if ((g_form.getValue('first_name')) && (g_form.getValue('last_name')) && g_form.getValue('mobile_number')) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            gr.initialize();
            gr.first_name = g_form.getValue('first_name');
            gr.last_name = g_form.getValue('last_name');
            gr.mobile_phone = g_form.getValue('mobile_number');
            gr.user_name = g_form.getValue('first_name') + "." + g_form.getValue('last_name');
        
            var sysID = gr.insert();
        
            g_form.setValue('caller_id', sysID);
        } else {
            g_form.addErrorMessage("Enter the mandatory fields");
        }
    }
    ]]>
    </script>
</j:jelly>
